function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Generalizing results from a sample dominated by engineers, architects, and facility managers","Impact":"Biased conclusions and recommendations for healthy buildings","Mitigation":"Include a more diverse representation of stakeholders in future research","Technologies":"None","People":"Researchers, stakeholders, professionals","Owner":"Researchers and research institutions"},{"Description":"Pandemic bias effect on questionnaire responses","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of the importance of building attributes and mental health symptoms","Mitigation":"Conduct future research after the pandemic to assess changes in perspectives","Technologies":"None","People":"Building professionals, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions"},{"Description":"Potential lag in academic publications compared to current trends","Impact":"Differences between literature review and questionnaire results","Mitigation":"Conduct a literature review covering the years following the pandemic to compare with questionnaire results","Technologies":"None","People":"Researchers, academic institutions","Owner":"Research institutions"}]}
